title: The Asset Allocator: Let’s Not Forget About Commodities
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The Washington Post discusses two new scientific studies published this month in the journal Nature, which together signal the risk of a global food crisis. This podcast (4:39) argues that the possibility of a food crisis should remind us of the value of hedging a portfolio with commodities investments, which rarely fall when stocks are falling.
